| History                 = The Sword of Judgment were a terrorist group who considered themselves revolutionaries representing the exploited people of the world. To wreak havoc on their perceived oppressors, they developed a thermonuclear bomb which they were prepared to set off underwater, causing a giant tidal wave and destroying the US East coast. They were defeated by the [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] and the [[Benjamin Grimm (Earth-616)|Thing]].{{r|Marvel Two-In-One #10}}
